welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Plan-les-Ouates, Switzerland! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's charming streets, known for its watchmaking industry. Explore and enjoy all that Plan-les-Ouates has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal T1
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geneve-cointrin Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Annemasse Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport handles all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Annecy-Meythe Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
